data.message: i meant tired of the same ole shit. my old man aint no sugar daddy, and im clockin pu--y, like how much to give how little to not, then i get pist off at god then im like what the fuck so what dive in muthuhfkah, whats cheep whats expensive thats a whole nother arguement but it still doesnt justify being a hoe. but i understand you know. i havent had anything to say in a while. i guess you just bring it out of me wink, i miss you too dude, im not for sure but did you purpose to some chick wink she better be fine inside out you deserve it. but time is of the essence i still got shit to say but not all in one breath i'll hollah later slim from shady
